main event: Three disc-like objects appeared at one mile intervals, one seemed to move from the ground. They appeared as bright flashes.
interesting points: The objects were described as disc-like and appeared at one-minute intervals.
One of the objects seemed to come up from the ground.
The objects appeared as bright flashes.
The flight path of the objects was just below the horizon, possibly brought into view by refraction.
The objects were likely identified as the planet Mars.
result: likely identified as the planet Mars
